task.title: Use a NetApp SAN
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to configure the NetApp Data ONTAP SAN as the block storage backend provider on the Storage Controller (SC).

taskbody.context: supports both NetApp Clustered Data ONTAP and traditional 7-mode SANs. NetApp Vservers and 7-mode Filers are managed by using NetApp Manageability Software Development Kit (NMSDK) and Data ONTAP APIs.
